name: Rodeo Master
description:
Howdy partner!

You think you got what it takes to ride the wildest animals this side of the West? Them beasts sure are out of control, but you sure are no namby-pamby!

Controls:

  • Press the WASD/Arrow keys AGAINST the direction the animal is moving.
    Diagonal count, so you may have to press two keys from time to time. They change directions a lot, so stay sharp!
  • If you see a sign above an animal, prepare yourself!
    • A cross mark means the beast is about to jump! Be sure to hold the Space key the whole time.
    • Sometimes, fireworks come flying out of the blue! When they explode, the ride becomes even more wild! You'll see an exclamation mark while this chaos ensues.
    • Oh boy, skulls are definitely not good. Hold tight, and tap the Space key everytime it shakes!

Fonts:
DS Roundup: https://www.1001fonts.com/ds-roundup-font.html
Kenney Mini Square: https://kenney.itch.io/kenney-game-assets-1

Sprites:
Kenney 1-Bit Pack: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack
